imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array

labels.description: Global labels applied to all resources

global.description: peers. -- (object) Global Docker image registry and shared labels

imagePullSecrets.description: Image pull secrets applied to workload pods

commonLabels.description: Labels to add to all rendered manifests

commonAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to all rendered manifests

replicaCount.description: Number of IPFS peers and cluster members

sharedSecret.description: Shared secret for cluster peers. Leave empty to auto-generate.

nodePort.description: Static nodePort to announce when enabled

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the NodePort service

fieldPath.description: Pod fieldRef used to resolve the host IP when value is empty

hostIP.description: Optional static IP address to advertise. When set, overrides fieldRef detection.

p2pNodePort.description: Configuration for the optional NodePort service used for public P2P addresses

extraEnv.description: Extra environment variables for the cluster container

extraContainers.description: Additional containers to inject into the pod

extraVolumeMounts.description: Additional volume mounts for the cluster container

volumeSize.description: Requested storage size for the cluster data PVC

storage.description: StorageClass for the cluster data PVC

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the cluster service

service.description: Service type for the cluster REST API

initScripts.description: Init scripts injected via ConfigMap (filename => script contents). Keys must match ^[A-Za-z0-9_.-]+$

customCommand.description: Extra commands to override the default entrypoint

extraArgs.description: Additional arguments passed to the container command

extraEnv.description: Additional environment variables for the IPFS container

extraContainers.description: Additional containers to inject into the pod

extraVolumeMounts.description: Additional volume mounts for the IPFS container

volumeSize.description: Requested storage size for the IPFS data PVC

storage.description: StorageClass for the IPFS data PVC

clusterPort.description: Cluster libp2p port used for announcements

appendAnnounce.description: Base Addresses.AppendAnnounce values. Entries are templated with Helm's tpl.

extraAppendAnnounce.description: Additional Addresses.AppendAnnounce entries appended after the defaults

datastore.description: Datastore.StorageMax value (e.g. 10Gi). Leave empty to skip.

resourceMgr.description: Swarm.ResourceMgr.MaxMemory value in bytes. Leave empty to skip.

config.description: Runtime configuration applied through init script

providerPeers.description: Default provider peers added when includeProviderPeers is true.

includeProviderPeers.description: Include providerPeers in bootstrap and peering configuration

bootstrap.description: Custom bootstrap peers added to the node. Objects must define ID and Addrs.

secretKey.description: Key within the secret that holds the swarm key

mountPath.description: Mount path for the swarm key secret inside the pod

repoPath.description: Destination directory for the swarm key inside the repo

swarmKey.description: Mount a swarm.key secret and copy it into the repo

runtime.description: Optional GOMEMLIMIT value for the IPFS container (e.g. "1024MiB")

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the IPFS service

ports.description: Service ports exposed by the IPFS peers

pathGroups.description: Path groups rendered for each hostname key

ingress.description: Ingress configuration for the cluster REST API

host.description: Global host applied to every rendered Route (per-route host overrides are optional)

annotations.description: Additional annotations merged into every Route

tls.description: TLS configuration applied when TLS is desired

wildcardPolicy.description: Wildcard policy used when a Route does not override it

routes.description: Route entries keyed by logical name; set enabled: false to skip a route
